improvement_list.improvement_desc: Potential division by zero.  Add a check to ensure y is not zero before the division on line 14. This could occur if the loop completes and y becomes 0.
Unnecessary computation in the loop. The value of y is overwritten in each iteration of the loop; therefore, the calculation of x inside the loop could potentially be simplified or optimized.
The variable z is computed and overwritten in line 7 and later overwritten in line 14. The intermediate value of z is not used after line 7.  Consider removing the redundant computation in line 14.
